abstract: Altria Group reached an agreement to buy UST, the maker of Skoal and Copenhagen smokeless tobacco, for about $10.2 billion.
snippet: Altria Group reached an agreement to buy UST, the maker of Skoal and Copenhagen smokeless tobacco, for about $10.2 billion.
lead_paragraph: Altria Group said Monday in a statement that it had reached an agreement to buy UST, the maker of Skoal and Copenhagen smokeless tobacco, for about $10.2 billion.

headline.main: Altria Buys Maker of Smokeless Tobacco
headline.print_headline: Altria Is Said to Buy Maker of Smokeless Tobacco

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced

abstract: Altria Group said Monday it reached an agreement to buy UST, the maker of Skoal and Copenhagen smokeless tobacco, for about $10.4 billion. Altria will pay $69.50 per share in cash for each UST share, a premium of nearly 29 percent above UST’s closing price on Thursday, the day before The New York Times  reported that the companies were in negotiations.
lead_paragraph: Altria Group said Monday it reached an agreement to buy UST, the maker of Skoal and Copenhagen smokeless tobacco, for about $10.4 billion. Altria will pay $69.50 per share in cash for each UST share, a premium of nearly 29 percent above UST’s closing price on Thursday, the day before The New York Times  reported that the companies were in negotiations.

headline.main: Altria to Buy UST for $10.4 Billion
